title: Best no-bake cheesecake
ingredients: ['125g digestive biscuit crumbs', '5 tablespoons dark brown soft sugar', '1/2 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '75g butter, melted', '450g cream cheese', '2 teaspoons lemon juice', '450ml whipping cream', '5 tablespoons caster sugar', '600g cherry fruit filling']
